articles.title: Strictly’s Richie Anderson breaks silence on Giovanni ‘feud’ amid rumours of tension backstage... - The Sun
articles.content:

articles.title: Kevin Feige On Not Recasting T'Challa In The MCU: 'It Was Much Too Soon' – Exclusive - Empire
articles.description: The Marvel boss opened up on the decision not to recast the man in the Black Panther mask. Read more at Empire.
